com.netflix.spectator.sandbox

Class BucketCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.spectator.sandbox.BucketCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.netflix.spectator.api.DistributionSummary, com.netflix.spectator.api.Meter
    Deprecated. 
    Moved to com.netflix.spectator.api.histogram package. This is now just a thin wrapper to preserve compatibility. Scheduled for removal after in Q3 2016.

    @Deprecated
public final class BucketCounter
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.netflix.spectator.api.DistributionSummary
    Counters that get incremented based on the bucket for recorded values.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static BucketCounter get(com.netflix.spectator.api.Id id,
                                BucketFunction f)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a distribution summary object that manages a set of counters based on the bucket function supplied. Calling record will increment the appropriate counter.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier for the metric being registered.
        f - Function to map values to buckets.
        Returns:
        Distribution summary that manages sub-counters based on the bucket function.

                                BucketFunction f)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a distribution summary object that manages a set of counters based on the bucket function supplied. Calling record will increment the appropriate counter.
        Parameters:
        registry - Registry to use.
        id - Identifier for the metric being registered.
        f - Function to map values to buckets.
        Returns:
        Distribution summary that manages sub-counters based on the bucket function.
